1.0.name: wordpress/wp-attachments
1.0.description:
This plugin automatically shows every file attached to a page or post under its content.

Every time we upload a file in our wordpress website, we should insert a link into the text area in order to show the file attached. This process is sometimes a waste of time and, expecially for government or school websites where the main information is based on files rather than 'post content', this plugin give a great added value! Once activated, every page, post or custom post type will show the list of the attachments uploaded there.

The plugin includes some great options to personalize/localize the front-end. More options and functions will be added soon!

For informations or support feel free to mail me at milesimarco AT outlook DOT com or use the Wordpress support forum.
